headline.main: Merkel Says No Justification for Erdogan's Nazi Comparisons
headline.print_headline: Merkel Says No Justification for Erdogan's Nazi Comparisons

lead_paragraph: The U.S. Supreme Court avoided a ruling on transgender rights by sending a closely watched case involving bathroom access at a Virginia high school back to a lower court on Monday after President Donald Trump rolled back protections for transgender students.
